ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Such people will receive an evil punishment and will be the greatest losers in the Next World.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are those who will suffer the worst chastisement in this life, and will be the greatest losers in the life to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is they for whom a grievous chastisement lies in store; it is they who shall be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will suffer the worst kind of torment and will be lost in the life to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is they for whom is the worst punishment, and they will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those for whom there will be an evil torment. And in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they who shall have an evil punishment, and in the hereafter they shall be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those are they whom an evil chastisement awaits, and they will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those are they for whom is the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they are the ones who will have the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those are they for whom shall be an evil torment. And in the Hereafter they shall be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the ones for whom there is a terrible punishment, and they are the ones who will be the biggest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such are they for whom a grievous Penalty is (waiting); and in the Hereafter theirs will be the greatest loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those for whom there will be an evil torment (in this world). And in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such are those for whom there is an evil punishment, and in the Everlasting Life are the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is they who will receive the grievous punishment—and in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:5] Those are they for whom there is an awful chastisement, the worst [chastisement] in this world: being killed or being taken captive; and in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers, because they will end up in the Fire which has been made everlasting for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those) who have this attribute (are they for whom is the worst of punishment) a severe chastisement in the Fire, (and in the Hereafter) on the Day of Judgement (they will be the greatest losers) they will loose Paradise and enter the Fire.
